Title: Tôkyô yakyoku
Actors: Kyôzô Nagatsuka, Kaori Momoi, Mitsuko Baishô
Plot: Hamanaka Koichi returns to the old ward in eastern Tokyo. No one knows why he disappeared and left his family behind. No one knows why he is back either. His wife is unsure whether she should be loyal to the departed man or not. H...
